title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "Outlines of the History of Greek Philosophy" by Edward Zeller, Meridian Books", 1955
medium: Lithography in brown, white and black ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically in black ink at lower right in script: lustig
On the upper 2/3 of the cover in white and black ink: Outlines/ of the/ History/ of Greek/ Philosophy [white]/ Edward/ Zeller [black]
Across the bottom in white and black ik: MERIDIAN BOOKS [white] published by The Noonday Press/ M9 $1.35 [black]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a brown background. The title, author and publisher are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover are the title, author's name, and synopsis of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "Outlines of the History of Greek Philosophy" by Edward Zeller, Meridian Books", 1955.
1955. Lithography in brown, white and black ink on white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-179.
